sect1.title: &rmt; &systemd; Commands
sect1.para: You can manage &rmt;-related services with the standard &systemd; commands. The &rmt; server has the following services and timers:

listitem.para: A &systemd; target that starts all required &rmt; components.
This server migrates the database to the newest schema, if required. There is no need to manually interact with this service.
This timer is responsible for periodically synchronizing all repository product data from the &scc;.
This timer is responsible for periodically synchronizing all RPMs from the &scc;.

sect1.para: Use systemctl to control the &rmt; services and timers.
